sys_remote_update_set.description: v1.0 Adds 'Print' button to display contents of Update Sets v1.1 Adds ability to select multiple Update Sets in list view v1.2 Adds functionality to consolidate Updates from multiple Update Sets into their respective types v1.3 Fixed bug to print name of Flow / Subflows v2.0 Added Functionality to toggle displaying Deleted Records, Option to dynamically display certain Types of Updates, Option to toggle showing Updates as Consolidated or Extended, Copy Data functionality, Integration with Digi to gather descriptions from AI
sys_remote_update_set.name: Update Set Printer v2.0

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4a7070dd8708b91003d2c888cebb3563
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UpdateSetPrinterUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateSetPrinterUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetPrinterUtil = Class.create();
UpdateSetPrinterUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /**
     * Sets the OBJ for the Update Type. Defines the name of the Type and the Show property.
     *
     * @param {obj} 'xmlUpdate' - XML Glide Record of Update
     * @return {obj}
     */
    getUpdateType: function(xmlUpdate) {
        var name = xmlUpdate.type.getValue();
        name = this._validateUpdateType(name, xmlUpdate);

        return {
            "name": name,
            "show": true
        };
    },

    /**
     * Helper function to sort Array of OBJs Alphabetically
     *
     * @param {array} 'array'
     * @param {string} 'sortVal' - Object Property used for sorting Array
     * @return {array}
     */
    sortArrayObjsAlphabetically: function(array, sortVal) {
        array.sort(function(a, b) {
            var textA = a[sortVal].toUpperCase();
            var textB = b[sortVal].toUpperCase();
            return (textA < textB) ? -1 : (textA > textB) ? 1 : 0;
        });
        return array;
    },

    /**
     * If Record Type is listed in Property, then return the payload property value within the Update XML Glide Record 
     *
     * @param {xmlUpdate} 'obj' - XML Glide Record of Update
	 * @param {}
     * @return {obj}
     */
    addUpdatePayload: function(xmlUpdate, type) {
        var legalDataTypes = gs.getProperty('update_set_printer.ai.description.tables');
        legalDataTypes = legalDataTypes.split(',');
        if (legalDataTypes.indexOf(type) > -1) {
            return xmlUpdate.getDisplayValue('payload');
        } else {
            return null;
        }
    },

    /**
     * Validate if record exists in Array based on the Coalesce Property
     *
     * @param {obj} 'obj' - Data Obj of new Update record
     * @param {string} 'coalesceProp' - Obj property to determine if Obj exists in Array (coalesce value)
     * @param {array} 'array' - Array of Update records already captured
     * @return {boolean}
     */
    isNewUpdate: function(obj, coalesceProp, array) {
        for (var i in array) {
            if (array[i][coalesceProp] == obj[coalesceProp]) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    },

    /**
     * Build Description as array splitting at new line if Update Set contains description
     *
     * @param {string} 'description' - Description of Update Set
     * @return {array} 'newDesc'
     */
    getDescription: function(description) {
        var newDesc = "";
        if (description) {
            newDesc = description.split("\n");
        }
        return newDesc;
    },

    /**
     * Build link to take user to update
     *
     * @param {xml} 'payload' - XML from sys_update_xml record
     * @return {string} 'link' - URL link to record
     */
    getUpdateURL: function(payload) {
        try {
            var update = gs.xmlToJSON(payload);
            var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
            if (update.record_update.table && update.record_update[update.record_update.table].sys_id) {
                link += update.record_update.table + "?sys_id=" + update.record_update[update.record_update.table].sys_id;
                return link;
            } else {
                return "";
            }

        } catch (e) {
            gs.error("Error building link for Update Set Printer:\n\n" + e);
            return "";
        }
    },

    _validateUpdateType: function(type, xmlUpdate) {
        return type == 'Flow' ? this._getFlowType(type, xmlUpdate.payload) : type == 'Action Type' ? 'Flow Action' : type;
    },

    _getFlowType: function(type, payload) {
        var update = gs.xmlToJSON(payload);
        var flowType = update.record_update.sys_hub_flow[0].type;

        return flowType == 'subflow' ? 'Subflow' : type;
    },

    type: 'UpdateSetPrinterUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mitch.deaner@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-14 09:01:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a7070dd8708b91003d2c888cebb3563</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateSetPrinterUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4a7070dd8708b91003d2c888cebb3563</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mitch.deaner@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-29 18:29:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil = Class.create();
UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    checkDescription: function() {
        var sys_ids = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_ids');
        var us = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
        us.addEncodedQuery('descriptionISEMPTY^sys_idIN' + sys_ids);
        us.query();
        if (us.next()) {
            gs.addErrorMessage("Please add Descripiton to '" + us.name.getValue() + "'.");
            return false;
        }
        return true;

    },

    enforceMandatoryDescription: function() {
        return gs.getProperty('rdusp.mandatory_description');
    },

    initiateRetrivalDigiDescription: function() {
        var data = this.getParameter('data');
        data = JSON.parse(data);
        for (var update in data.updates) {
            if (data.updates[update].payload) {
                data.updates[update].digi_desc = this._getDigiDescription(data.updates[update].payload);
            }
        }
        data.obtainedDigiDesc = true;
        return JSON.stringify(data);
    },

    _getDigiDescription: function(payload) {
        var ai = new x_radi_digi.DigiRequest();
        var xml = payload;
        var json = gs.xmlToJSON(xml);
        var prompt = "Give a breif explaination of the following script on the " + json.record_update.table + " table.";
        ai.setAction('Explain Script Function');
        ai.getAnswer(prompt, json.record_update[json.record_update.table].script);
		var answer = JSON.parse(ai.getAIAnswerAsText());
		return answer.description;
    },

    type: 'UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-29 16:38:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mitch.deaner@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-29 13:57:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
